org.apache.flink.runtime.state.internal

接口 InternalMergingState<N,IN,OUT>

  • 类型参数:
    N - The type of the namespace
    IN - The type of elements added to the state
    OUT - The type of elements
    所有超级接口:
    AppendingState<IN,OUT>, InternalAppendingState<N,IN,OUT>, InternalKvState<N>, MergingState<IN,OUT>, State
    所有已知子接口:
    InternalAggregatingState<N,IN,OUT>, InternalListState<N,T>, InternalReducingState<N,T>
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractHeapMergingState, HeapAggregatingState, HeapListState, HeapReducingState, RocksDBAggregatingState, RocksDBListState, RocksDBReducingState

    public interface InternalMergingState<N,IN,OUT>
extends InternalAppendingState<N,IN,OUT>, MergingState<IN,OUT>
    The peer to the MergingState in the internal state type hierarchy. See InternalKvState for a description of the internal state hierarchy.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void mergeNamespaces(N target, java.util.Collection<N> sources)
      Merges the state of the current key for the given source namespaces into the state of the target namespace.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.api.common.state.AppendingState

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.flink.api.common.state.State

        clear

    • 方法详细资料

      • mergeNamespaces

        void mergeNamespaces(N target,
                     java.util.Collection<N> sources)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Merges the state of the current key for the given source namespaces into the state of the target namespace.
        参数:
        target - The target namespace where the merged state should be stored.
        sources - The source namespaces whose state should be merged.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The method may forward exception thrown internally (by I/O or functions).
